text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ahh… Trainer……
choice_data_list: Do you feel up to the race today?
Think you're up to the race today?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
…………! I-I'm so sorry. 
I'm so sorry, I'm so sorry…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I-I'm so…… sorry! 
…… I'm just so—
choice_data_list: You don't need to apologize.
You don't need to apologize.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …… Why?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Why are you so nice to me? 
Even though I'm… I'm such a good-for-nothing.
choice_data_list: You're not a good-for-nothing.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
No, it's true!! I'm so useless… 
such a useless good-for-nothing…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I told myself that I wanted to change… over and over again…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Even though I didn't want to be away from my mother, 
I came all the way to Tracen Academy. I did so much 
training and even signed up for races!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But… that wasn't enough. Just thinking about entering 
the race fills me with so much fear, just like that time 
during the Selection Race…!
choice_data_list: What are you afraid of?
What are you afraid of?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
…… I'm afraid of realizing I'll never be able to 
achieve my dream of becoming the blue rose.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'm afraid that even if I were to enter a race, 
I wouldn't be able to make anyone happy…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'm afraid of learning the truth… that no matter 
what I do, I'll always be a good-for-nothing……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Whenever those thoughts cross my mind, I become 
so afraid that I start shaking all over…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'm just… I'm sorry, Trainer, for being so useless… 
You should just give up on me…!
choice_data_list: <size=34>It shows how desperately you wanted to change.</size>
It proves how far you were willing to go.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ……… Huh?
choice_data_list: Feeling scared is proof of that desire.

You feel scared because you 
long so hard to change.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B-But… that's……
choice_data_list:
As long as you don't give up on yourself, 
I won't give up on you.

As long as you don't give up on yourself, 
I won't give up on you.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ……! R-Really?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
You're telling me it's okay for me to keep trying? 
You really believe in me…? That I can change…?
choice_data_list: I'll be waiting for you at the racetrack!
I'll be waiting for you at the racetrack!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: La-lalala～♪ Lalala～♪

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
You can do this. You can do this, Rice! 
… You got this!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ah, Rice! You came out～!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Urara…! 
Y-You were waiting for me…?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Yep! You're going to try your hardest, right? 
Then of course I'll be rooting for you! 
Go, go, Rice, gooo～!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Urara…! Yeah! Thank you so much……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You can do this, Rice… Yeah!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ahh……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
(My legs, my hands… they're still trembling. 
My fingers feel so cold…!)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (But even so, this is something I must do…!)
choice_data_list: Rice!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer……!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I, um… ah… 
You know, I —
choice_data_list:
You got this! You'll bloom 
into a beautiful blue rose!

You got this! You'll bloom 
into a beautiful blue rose!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You're right… I'm going to show them what I'm made of!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (I've… always hated myself……)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
(For the longest time, I've despised how I'm always causing 
trouble for others, bringing misfortune to people, all because 
I'm a worthless good-for-nothing.)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (But today is different—!!)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hah, haa, hah, haa…!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The front-runners are storming past the third corner!! 
However, a jet-black figure appears to be making a bold 
move from the outside! It's none other than Rice Shower!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
(I want to change! I refuse to give up! 
I hate to remain a good-for-nothing!!)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
(I want to believe that even someone 
like me can bring happiness to people, 
just like the blue rose…!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
With 200m remaining, Rice Shower forces her way to the front!! 
It's an intense showdown between first and second place!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Only 100m remain! Who's it going to be? 
Who's going to take home the victory?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I want to change… No, I will change!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
They've crossed the finish line!! And it's Rice Shower who 
triumphs in the end !! Her unwavering resolve to take the lead 
at the final showdown was truly remarkable!!
(YEAAAAAHHHHH!!!)

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Amazing stuff, Rice Shower!! 
That was such an exhilarating race!!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
That had my heart pumping!! 
I'll definitely come to watch you race again!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: U-Um, Trainer… Would you let me make a selfish request…?
choice_data_list: A selfish request?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah. If you're okay with it…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Would you let me call you big brother…?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Would you let me call you big sister…?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Or… is that too weird…?
choice_data_list: If that's what you want, sure thing.
If that's what you want, it's good with me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: R-Really!? T-Then……!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Please continue to look after me from now on!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: —— Big brother!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: —— Big sister!
